Class Schedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • Schedule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    public class Schedule
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Created by mhan on 10/15/2016. A Schedule object stores information about the collection of courses in which a student is enrolled

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Schedule()
      Constructor of Schedule Initializes the courses field

      void add​(Course courseToAdd)
      Add a new course to courses in this schedule, if there is no conflict with existing courses When conflict, throws ScheduleConflictException

      Gets the course happening in given day and time

      Removes all courses if it conflicts with given day and time

      Saves all the courses sorted according to the comparator to an output stream
      int totalCredits()
      Calculates the total credit of all courses in this schedule
